EmailTemplate.subject: Sell While Your Sales Staff is Away
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As we deal with uncertain times, it’s even more important to utilize every available resource you can to reach your customers and keep part orders flowing. GoDirect Trade provides an online marketplace for customers to find your parts 24/7—even while your sales team is away.
The ability to reach a large group of customers virtually will become even more critical than it’s been in the past. List your inventory and sell to over 7,000 users across 3,000+ companies. For a limited time only, we are offering a no-obligation 6 months free subscription.
What are the three easy steps to launch your storefront?
- Enter basic store information and load a banner from our image library. - Upload your listings. - Orders will be sent to your email for immediate fulfillment. LAUNCH A STOREFRONT <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/customer/account/login/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=SellMore]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=User_Growth]]> (powered by Honeywell)
